name: PURGATORY 2
description: This is the add on to the already successful PURGATOR.WAD. This version has those little bugs fixed. Ya'll know which one's. A teleport has been added to the pit. "Since everyone who fell in it seemed to die :)". Along with alot more inhancements, for better game play. "Watch out for telefrags people. " This wad runs well on a 486dx-50,and was meant to be played with Deathmatch 2.0."Due to the fact that this wad gets very dark."
